Pleni Sites

Pleni sites is a generator sitemap, one of many tools that make pleni.

Pleni is a useful tool to create and execute tasks aimed towards information security, which are so necessary in the stages of software development, web deployed systems and safety assessments.

Pleni is free software, and will be deployed as a service by the Hiperbórea Company in a few months, for which you can register for the beta service, contribute, share, test, and more.

Register my email for beta launch.
